alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 7:46AM HST until January 12 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI AND BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Oahu. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Consider postponing hiking plans. Make sure tents and awnings are secure, or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
